article.title: EDO Receives $40 Million Contract Modification
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: EDO Communications and Countermeasures Systems Incorporated is being awarded a $40.3 million modification to a previously awarded contract for the production and support of 555 JCREW 2.1 radio-controlled improvised explosive device (RCIED) electronic warfare (CREW) systems to meet urgent U.S. Defense Department requirements in support of Operation Iraqi Freedom.
